extendedInfo.description: The  Lifelong App,  will be  a  great  guide  for  All,  who  live  in  U.S.A .   Tips  for  every  issues  like  Housing,  Education,  Loans,  Tax,  Job,  Foreclosure,  Small Businesses,  Managing  finances,  Child support  &  every  significant  issues  that  you  could  think  of  for  your  everyday  life  requirements.  Get  the  answers,  with in seconds  and  without  Internet.   An  excellent  App  to  help  you  through  the  busy  everyday  life  in  USA,  with  24  essential  topics (To  improve  personality . Job search & Interview Tips.  Happy family tips.  Car/Van/Truck  Maintenance tips.  Mortgage .  Nutrition Tips.  Pregnancy Tips.  Insurance Tips.  Safe  driving tips.  Good fitness.  Symptoms  &  Risk factors  of  different  types  of diseases.  (kids  developmental  tips  from 2 months  to 5 yrs, Vaccination guide, Positive  parenting tips from infants  to  11yrs of  age  & health tips). Natural disaster preparation  &  Emergency  Plan Tips.  First  Aid . Be-Alert Tips.  Computer-Laptop security Tips.  ID- Theft.  Pets Maintenance  tips.  Safe & Healthy Air travel Tips.  List of Holidays( USA).  Visa services & Passport  tips (USA ).  Food safety & cooking Tips.  Tips  for  common  issues  like Housing,  Education  Loans,  Tax,  Foreclosure,  small Businesses,  Managing  finances,  Child support  &  every  significant  issues that you  could  think  of  for  your  everyday  life  requirements.Any  comments  Pls  E-mail  to  david.9922@yahoo.com

reviews.author: jennis jose

reviews.title: A very useful app
reviews.comment: The app is very useful those residing in USA. It\'s like all-in-one app filled with life tips and tricks. It prepares you for life events. What you do in life? Study, prepare for interview, get job, make family, have kids, drive car, etc etc. The stuffs you should know regarding these are all collected in one app. It guides you for cooking, fitness, visa, travel tips. I also liked the last \'Guide for All\' section which addresses common issues tax credit, home foreclosure, managing finances, identity theft, child support and every significant issues that you could think of. Other thing I liked is about the app is that you don\'t need internet connection to use the app.    I wouldn\'t hesitate to spend for the useful apps that\'s just worth one starbucks coffee :)
reviews.author: Aashish Poudel

reviews.title: Highly useful app!
reviews.comment: This is such a useful app for all ages. I use this daily and it has been signifcantly helpful! Try it for yourself! You wont be disappointed!
